scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy $npm_package_name --memory 128Mi --region us-east1 --trigger-event-filters=database=realtime-missions-db --trigger-event-filters-path-pattern=document=events/* --trigger-event-filters=type=google.cloud.firestore.document.v1.written --gen2 --entry-point $npm_package_name --source . --runtime nodejs20  --service-account realtime-missions-api@realtime-missions.iam.gserviceaccount.com --stage-bucket realtime-missions-functions
